title: Spot Bikes TiSlide Trail Tool
content:
Spot Bikes just announced an all-new TiSlide Trail Tool ($44.99) that features a titanium sliding T-handle, giving you the versatility of extra leverage when you need it, and a compact design when space is tight. It’s paired with a curated set of S2 tool steel bits, handpicked by Spot to work with virtually all the fasteners on your bike, no matter the type.

One standout is the extra-long T30 bit, perfect for accessing and adjusting your Spot’s pivot hardware. Whether you’re making fine adjustments to your cockpit or tackling trailside repairs, the Spot TiSlide Trail Tool has your back.

It comes packed in a rugged canvas pouch that’s more than just a tool carrier—it’s perfect for stashing other essentials like tire levers, plugs, CO2, ID and a credit card, keeping everything organized and ready to go. Compact enough to fit in your pack or pocket.

Check out more at Spot Bikes.
